title: Unwanted browser popups: how to turn off?
content: I write stuff on Microsoft Word Online and lately, I get pop-ups from my browser that tell me to close the site, as it's slowing down my browser. I don't want to close my tabs, because I switch between them fairly frequently (I'm writing a story, and I need to keep track of other parts so you can see why that's a no-go). Is there a way to turn this specific pop-up off? I get annoyed always closing out of it whenever it shows up. I use FireFox on a Windows OS system and currently have version 133.0.3 (64-bit). I've had this show up in older versions as well, so it's not just limited to this version. Any help fixing this would be appreciated. -Mars
creator: mars_adept_enten

title: My AOL mail not working on Firefox
content: Three days ago, my AOL mail account began working very slowly and repeatedly claims to have no internet connection when accessed on Firefox which has been my default browser for years. When I open my AOL on Microsoft Edge it works fine, but I prefer not to switch browsers if not necessary. I am using Windows 10 and have Norton Safe Search on both Firefox and Microsoft Edge. I did erase history and cookies for the past 12 hrs but don't want to loose all passwords and connections by erasing all history if that would happen. Please help me! Tod Twichell twichell655@aol.com
creator: twichell655

title: Salesforce Classic Template won't display preview
content:
In Salesforce, I need to be able to display the preview of template. The page give the error of: 

Firefox Can’t Open This Page. To protect your security, cwl.my.salesforce.com will not allow Firefox to display the page if another site has embedded it. To see this page, you need to open it in a new window.

Learn more… Report errors like this to help Mozilla identify and block malicious sites

I can't open it in a new tab, or copy the URL because the preview is in a frame inside the Salesforce interface. Whenever I need to use templates I end up opening another browser, which I would rather not do.
creator: doron1
